channel.title: CVE Feed for AVG -- AVG Antivirus

item.title: CVE-2023-1587|2023-04-19T18:39:52.636Z -- avg -- avg%20antivirus
item.description: Avast and AVG Antivirus for Windows were susceptible to a NULL pointer dereference issue via RPC-interface. The issue was fixed with Avast and AVG Antivirus version 22.11
